item.title: Realist Governance: Revisiting Cave! Hic Dragones and Beyond
item.description: Sterling-Folker, Jennifer. “Realist Governance: Revisiting Cave! Hic Dragones and Beyond.” In Contending Perspectives on Global Governance, edited by Alice D. Ba, Matthew J. Hoffman, 27-48. London: Springer, 2006. Keywords: Theory; Realism; Regime Theory Text access (external link)
